title: APIs
description: The Content Clarifier is also available as API, complemented by IBM Watson deep learning technology, to dynamically simplify, summarize or enhance digital content. To request access to the API, send an email to scottw1@us.ibm.com

left.title: Simplify API
left.description: Lexical and grammatical manipulation is performed to improve comprehension. Non-literal expressions such as idioms and colloquialisms are also replaced with their simple English counterparts. Simplified mode also supports enabling 'enhanced content', which returns simple English definitions, as well as additional information about identified topics.

left.title: Condense API
left.description: Content is summarized for quick reading.

right.title: Condense-Simplify API
right.description: A second pass of simplification is performed on summarized content.

right.title: Chat Summarization API
right.description: Summarizes the content of the chat
